verses.name: Romans 10:14
verses.text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard? and how shall they hear without a preacher?

verses.name: Romans 10:15
verses.text: And how shall they preach, except they be sent? as it is written, How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace, and bring glad tidings of good things!

verses.name: Romans 10:16
verses.text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel. For Esaias saith, Lord, who hath believed our report?

verses.name: Romans 10:17
verses.text: So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
